Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your inquiry regarding Stox Bank Details For more information you can follow this FAQs LINK Or Bank account for Stox:
Piraeus Bank 1 Spyrou Kyprianou Avenue 1065 Nicosia, P.O. Box 25700 1393 Nicosia Cyprus
SWIFT: PIRBCY2N
A/C: 1472330 (EUR) IBAN: CY63008001700000000001472330
A/C: 1472346 (GBP) IBAN: CY19008001700000000001472346
A/C: 1472351(USD) IBAN: CY78008001700000000001472351
Please make sure that you 1. Use your full name as you have registered on your account 2. You scan the bank SWIFT receipt and send it to support@stox.com 3. Or you may upload from your account.
We wish you all the best with your investments Stox Support Team
